about_the_game:
You are a legendary treasure hunter, looking for the Stone of Silence, a powerful artifact that got lost in an old temple. There, you will find a series of weird machines full of puzzles to crack to gain your freedom!

Odd Machines: Lost Artifacts is a 3D escape room puzzle game where you must solve complex mechanical puzzles, discover hidden objects, and unveil intriguing mysteries!

Dive into a world where cryptic vibes, complex mechanisms, and smooth controls from top escape room games blend to challenge your brain skills. You'll tackle unique puzzle sets on a mysterious, gripping adventure. Every machine is crafted to deliver the ultimate escape and exploration thrill.

SOLVE UNIQUE PUZZLE BOXES

Embark on a puzzling adventure with an eclectic mix of original Victorian machinery, classic and architectural enigmas

EXPLORE AN ANCIENT TEMPLE

Step into a mesmerizing world where every move you make reveals new mysteries and changes!

COLLECT ALL THE FRAGMENTS OF THE STONE OF SILENCE

Once you get all 8 pieces of the lost stone, you'll be transported into a mystical scene where you'll have to crack numeric puzzles to put the pieces together and finally escape the temple

IMMERSIVE AUDIO

The sound effects and tunes are so mind-blowingly good that will whisk you away on an unforgettable, vibe-filled adventure!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.0, or later
  • Processor: Intel x86 + Apple silicon (64bit OS required)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
